purpose: Give a general instruction about the bin packing.

prompt.content: During solving a block problem, I must follow several rules.
First, I must pick up a free block, that means on the block there is be nothing, and I will call it clear
Second, I can not hold two blocks at once.
Third, to pick up an underlying block, I have to grab a block above and put it down on the table.
Fourth, to stack a block on the another block, an another block must be clear.
Fifth, to unstack a block, a block must be clear.
